name: NssmManage
description: Install and edit windows services through nssm.
author: cnatan
helpMarkDown: Install and edit windows services through nssm. Fields leave empty will be reseted to nssm default.

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory when nssm commands are run. Not valid for remote executions.

inputs.name: serviceState
inputs.label: Desired Service State
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service state after applying settings.

inputs.name: servicename
inputs.label: Service Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Windows service name.

inputs.name: apppath
inputs.label: Application path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Application or script to be runned as service.

inputs.name: startupdir
inputs.label: Startup directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Startup directory of the windows service. Default is the ApplicationPath directory.

inputs.name: appargs
inputs.label: Application Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Arguments to be passed to application runned as service.

inputs.name: displayname
inputs.label: Service Display Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The windows service display name.

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Service Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: The windows service description.

inputs.name: serviceaccount
inputs.label: Service LogOn Account
inputs.helpMarkDown: The windows service account to run the service. Default is system account.

inputs.name: serviceaccountpass
inputs.label: Service LogOn Account Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: The windows service account password.

inputs.name: outfile
inputs.label: I/O stdout file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of file to redirect application stdout.

inputs.name: errfile
inputs.label: I/O stderr file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of file to redirect application stderr.

inputs.name: rotate
inputs.label: Rotate stdout/stderr files
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether rotate log file generated from stdout/stderr redirect.

inputs.name: rotaterunning
inputs.label: Rotate files while running
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether rotate log file while service is running. Default is only on service start.

inputs.name: rotateperseconds
inputs.label: Rotate files older than X seconds
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict rotation to files older than X seconds.

inputs.name: rotateperbytes
inputs.label: Rotate files bigger than X bytes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Restrict rotation to files bigger than X bytes.

inputs.name: remote
inputs.label: Remote execution through WinRM
inputs.helpMarkDown: Execute action in a remote machine instead of the agent.

inputs.name: Machine
inputs.label: Machine
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target machine IP or FQDN.

inputs.name: AdminUserName
inputs.label: Admin Login
inputs.helpMarkDown: Administrator login for the target machine.

inputs.name: AdminPassword
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Administrator password for the target machine.
It can accept variable defined in Build/Release definitions as '$(passwordVariable)'.
You may mark variable type as 'secret' to secure it.

inputs.name: Protocol
inputs.label: Protocol
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the protocol to use for the WinRM connection with the machine(s). Default is HTTPS.

inputs.name: TestCertificate
inputs.label: Test Certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the option to skip validating the authenticity of the machine's certificate by a trusted certification authority. The parameter is required for the WinRM HTTPS protocol.

inputs.name: nssmpath
inputs.label: Nssm executable path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Nssm executable path if not in PATH variable.

inputs.name: recovertaction
inputs.label: Recover Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to take when applications exits other than in response to a controlled service shutdown
